books.title: Written in the Stars
reviews: Life is a collection of moments, some memorable and some mundane. Often it is the tiniest things that bring the greatest joy, even through at that time, we have no idea that what we are witnessing may be magical, something that we will talk about and laugh over after many years.
books.author: Manin
